import React from'react';import'./TimelineSection.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const timelineData=[{type:'experience',title:'Project Manager, Axios Softwork',subtitle:'2022 - 2024',description:'Led SAAS projects, agile workflows, and oversaw budgets and team velocity.'},{type:'education',title:'BCA – Tribhuvan University',subtitle:'2018 - 2021',description:'Bachelor of Computer Applications, GPA - 3.22'},{type:'experience',title:'Associate PM, Nexus Incorporation',subtitle:'2021 - 2022',description:'Managed Project through Odoo, System and Workflow Improvement, Risk analysis and control.'},{type:'education',title:'+2 Science – Khwopa Higher Secondary School',subtitle:'2016 - 2018',description:'Completed Higher Secondary Education in Science stream, GPA - 2.79'}];const TimelineSection=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"timeline-section",id:"experience",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"timeline-title",children:"Experience & Education"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"timeline-container",children:[timelineData.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`timeline-item ${item.type} ${index%2===0?'left':'right'}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"timeline-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:item.subtitle}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:item.description})]})},index)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"timeline-line"})]})]});};export default TimelineSection;
